name: VR Speed Slide Snow 2017: For VR Card Board
name_original: VR Speed Slide Snow 2017: For VR Card Board
description:
A realistic snow and water slide riding in realistic snow and water park and control the speed of your extreme jump with massive sharp turns at intersections. Unlike water slide in water park, this snow slide jump riding is more exciting and entertaining.

This is truly an extreme ride like a super thrilling ride in the water park and snow park. A kind of fast snow driving game in swimming pool like environment, but overall it certainly provides challenging levels to complete snow slides on snowy mountains and snowy hills.



Features of Snow Slide
• Snow Slide Extreme Jump in Amusement Snow Park
• Quick Ride With Multiple Snow Sliding Characters
